name: Slice and Dice
description:
Slice And Dice is 4 player battle to the death. Fight your way around through the arena whilst chopping up foes and objects on your way to victory.

Developed originally for Make-A-Thing a 5 day game jam. The mechanics are inspired by 3 words provided by the game jam; mass, staccato and prolong.

  • Mass inspired changing your opponents and objects mass when you slice and dice them up. 
  • Staccato inspired the separation of your opponents and objects into multiple chunks.
  • Prolong inspired the need try and survive the longest whilst slicing and dicing the environment to hinder your foes.

Download & install instructions

NOTE: Xbox Controllers Required

1) unzip

2) Run .exe

Can be player with less than 4 players
